title: (x) KNI / Kurt Noble Identity - Eclat {Mike Y}
content:
The closest match i found with wtfont is ITC Century, can anyone do better on this?   
   
cheers   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110032108im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39846.gif)
author: promotype

comments.content: I think maybe [ITC Garamond Ultra Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110032108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/itc-garamond/ultra-italic/testdrive.html?s=kni&p=48) would work with a slight modification to the serifs.
I think it looks like [Letraset Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110032108/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=405832), which is sold now by Agfa.
